Title: MONTH()
Description: Return the month from the date passed

Returns the month for date, in the
          range 1 to 12 for
          January to December, or 0 for dates such as
          '0000-00-00' or
          '2008-00-00' that have a zero month part.
          Returns NULL if
          date is NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT MONTH('2008-02-03');
        -> 2
